title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 10000.1 - Adoption/scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 10000.1 - Adoption/scope

State Regulations
(a) Adoption. These
regulations are adopted by the Industrial Exhibit Authority in compliance with
section
2880
of
the Public Authorities Law of the State of New York. (b) Scope. These regulations specify the
policies and procedures relating to payment on contracts entered into by the

Industrial Exhibit Authority. For purposes of these regulations, a contract is
a written agreement with any person, partnership, private corporation or
association to sell materials, equipment or supplies, or to lease property or
equipment to the authority, to construct, reconstruct, rehabilitate or repair
buildings or improvements for or on behalf of the Authority or to provide any
other services to the authority pursuant to a contract. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
10000.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
